input_text.Prompt:
You will write a professional product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product title information.

Product title:
Arnold Homelite .095-Inch String Trimmer Head Assembly

Product keywords:
Homelite/John Deere Trimmer Head Assembly
Fits John Deere and Homelite straight shaft string trimmers
Pre-wound trimmer spool
.095" diameter
input_text.Response A: The Arnold Homelite .095-Inch String Trimmer Head Assembly is a pre-wound spool made to fit John Deere and Homelite straight shaft string trimmers. With a diameter of .095", this heavy-duty spool is built to withstand even the toughest of jobs. The Arnold Homelite String Trimmer Head Assembly is a top-of-the-line unit that delivers professional performance and long-lasting durability, making it a great investment for any professional landscaper or homeowner who takes pride in their property.
input_text.Response B: Arnold Universal String Trimmer Head Assembly is compatible with most straight shaft gas trimmers. It features a pre-wound trimmer spool and a .095" diameter.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
